body_html:
@LeoZDong PyTorch tries to start CUDA library, and CUDA library fails with this error. It's unclear why this happens on Mac (on Linux I have some more visibility).
Do you have any luck running the examples that come with CUDA (when you installed it)?

body:
@LeoZDong PyTorch tries to start CUDA library, and CUDA library fails with this error. It's unclear why this happens on Mac (on Linux I have some more visibility).
Do you have any luck running the examples that come with CUDA (when you installed it)?
